attributes.action: To STOP EDD BALLS  allowing GRAND PARENTS access rights to OUR CHILDREN  following a feud and if  the GRANDPARENTS have harmed their own children or any other children in any way. Please do not take Our rights as Parents AND   Protectors of Our Children  away.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading and article in The Guardian News paper dated 19th January 2010. Stating that Edd BALLs children's minister plans to allow Grandparents access rights to our Children .
I feel that rights should not be granted to Grandparents because of a Family Feuds, or When Parents feel there is a risk to their Children because of the Grandparents. I feel that the old rules should apply in these situations and would like that to remain the same. So these types of Grandparents are kept away from our children and we as PARENTS  can still protect them from unpredictable  individuals that resides in Our Families. And not let them come to harm at the hands of the Governments actions.
Please join me in keeping our precious Children safe,and sign this petition to be delivered to Downing street 

Thank you  

MRS STELLA WESTERN
